Don't Miss It

Available for Android and iOS

Finally The Very First Shopping Assistant
That Actually Does The Job For You!

You just tell us which shopping stores are you favorite ones and what product or service exactly you're looking for. We'll make sure you never miss a single discount again by notifying you the very first second there's a NEW BIG DISCOUNT for those same products/service and stores!

How it works?

1) searching discounts is easier than ever

Use the filters bellow to preview only the ones you want, and the map to locate them.

2) make your favorites stores a priority

Use the filters bellow to preview only the ones you want, and the map to locate them.

3) mark the exact product or service you need

Use the filters bellow to preview only the ones you want, and the map to locate them.

4) put your phone in the pocket and relax

Use the filters bellow to preview only the ones you want, and the map to locate them.

So why use it?

…simply because SPOT:

  • saves you time
    Quickly find the biggest & newest discounts in 1 place wherever you are.

    Quickly find the biggest & newest discounts in 1 place wherever you are.

    Quickly find the biggest & newest discounts in 1 place wherever you are.
